Entries.default: "I sloshed grimy water on the scroll! Surely it'll dry before the priests notice?"
"You get used to the darkness. Mostly."
"Wish you a good turn of the Wheel, sir."
Entries.female: "Wish you a good turn of the Wheel, ma'am."

Entries.default: "Soon as I sweep the vestry out, he's chiseled another stone and spread new grit."
"Guard your step, sir. Some of the drop-offs are a sure killer."
Entries.female: "Guard your step, ma'am. Some of the drop-offs are a sure killer."
